Articles.Content:
Every time I start up CKAN I keep getting the message "Failed to connect to repository. Exception: Object reference not set to an instance of an object."

 

It also says that there are 0 compatible mods that I can get. Anyone know how to fix this? And sorry if this isn't the right place to post this.

I'm trying to get this to work for the latest 64 bit version of KSP. Any help would be great, thanks.
I have also this issue today.  CKAN is dead, long live CKAN.
